mapper.select: SELECT NOTE.*, IT_MEMBER.m_nickname FROM NOTE INNER JOIN IT_MEMBER ON IT_MEMBER.m_no = NOTE.N_SENDER WHERE N_RECEIVER = #{n_receiver}
SELECT NOTE.*, IT_MEMBER.M_NICKNAME FROM NOTE INNER JOIN IT_MEMBER ON IT_MEMBER.M_NO = NOTE.N_RECEIVER WHERE N_SENDER = #{n_sender}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTE (N_NO, N_SENDER, N_RECEIVER, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_SENDDATE, N_READDATE) VALUES (NOTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{n_sender},(SELECT M_NO FROM IT_MEMBER WHERE M_NICKNAME=#{n_receiver_nickname}), #{n_title},#{n_content}, SYSDATE, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTE WHERE N_RECEIVER = #{n_receiver} AND N_READDATE IS NULL
